website_summaries.verdict: Not only will your dog get a sturdy collar with reflective stitching, but so will a rescue dog as one is donated along with every purchase.
pros: The collars seem to be very comfortable for dogs even though they are very durable, even withstanding the chewing of puppies, yet still come with a lifetime warranty
There are separate locations for the tags and the clip ring
cons: There are not many color options
The end can be hard to push through the buckle

customer_reviews.title: BUY BUY These are GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I search far and WIDE for a buckle collar that rocks in appearance. I have slider identifiers plates that have to slide on and won't do it over the snap buckles. This collar is super fantastic. I bought a small. I have a chihuahua/jack russell terrier mix and she is 15lbs. She buckles on the third hole in and wait for it!!! The absolute best part????? The end does NOT stick out and hang down!!! She has such a nice collar. And the fact that we help any dog rescue foundations only makes it better! We also have a rescue at home and I know they are grateful for the extra help!
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Collar and so does my 70 lb black ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love this Collar and so does my 70 lb black 4 year male (Bentley) Pit Bull. I purchased the "Large" size and it fits perfectly and I really like the "reflective" stitching. Also very sturdy! PS. He knows he has a new collar and started acting like a big baby!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Collars!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our two Beagle puppies. The color and material has held up nicely, especially considering the amount of rough-housing that takes place between these two 5 month old boys. I really like that the reflective material is stitched into the collar rather than printed on it like with some other brands. One pup did develop a sore under the buckle, so I had to buy him a different brand - but I believe this was due to an allergy to whatever type of metal is in the buckle, not due to a defect in the collar itself. That particular pup has thinner fur and more sensitive skin than his brother.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner material than my old leashes and collars, but plenty heavy enough for my 55lb dogs. Nice quality. Good enough that I will seek them out to buy them again when needed. Nice quality material, stitching and hardware. Great selection of colors. Now we finally have color matched "stuff" for our dogs. They were out of stock for one of the items I needed, so I contacted them and they responded very quickly and were very helpful in getting me what I needed/wanted. They were great to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Akita

customer_reviews.title: Dog is looking good in his new collar
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the XL color for my Golden. It was way too big. In the spirit of Max and Neo Max, I decided not to return it, but to donate it to a local shelter. I ordered a L, which fits my dog fine. I like the little plastic holder especially made for holding the tags. I have never seen this feature on any other collar. Quite inventive. That allows placement of the leash on the ring near the buckle to remain unobstructed. The collar appears well made and sturdy. My dog seems completely comfortable and happy with his new collar. I really appreciate that this company matches purchases with a donation to shelter dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Keyson

customer_reviews.title: Great collar - no slippage
customer_reviews.text: Just got this collar a couple days ago but it is perfect and since I currently have 2 rescues as part of my family it was a bonus to be able to support a company that also supports rescue. I have hag problem after problem with collars that have plastic clips to close and adjust the collar. They always seem to slip and I am constantly adjusting them. Not the case with these collars. Once they are fitted, they stay put and have a handy ring that I use for the small carabiner I use to hold their tags. Don’t need it for the leash as both pups have harnesses.
customer_reviews.author: Weimaranamama

customer_reviews.title: Much Safer Than Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This collar is the best! Wish I had bought it first. I had an adjustable collar, but it would loosen up a little if my dog pulled on his leash very hard. The last straw was when he ran after our other dog. I pulled him back, and his collar just slipped off. I was standing there with a leash, a collar, and no dog. Luckily my husband was right there and grabbed the dog before he ran off. When I went back in the house, I immediately ordered this collar. It fits perfectly and does NOT loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C.

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: This collar is well made, but there are a couple of items that could use improvement. As other's have stated the little plastic piece meant to attach the tags to could be better. The fabric that holds the plastic piece to the collar will wear out faster than the collar. My dog likes to hang his head out the window and after about a month the tag fabric started to pull away and fray. Another downside is that the grommet holes on the collar seem to bend after a little bit of use and that can make it tricky to buckle. We are still using the collar, but we do not use the fabric / plastic tag loop.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Great collar.  Must have for your dog.
customer_reviews.text: I measured my 3 year old Pitts neck with a wire. Pulled it snug. Measured and it was 16 inches. I put this collar on and it fit perfectly right in the middle hole. I have purchased several products. Leashes. Collars. Etc.. from this company. I am VERY pleased. All the products I have purchased are well constructed. At night. If light hits the collar or leash it will reflect perfectly. MY Pitt is a very strong puller. I'm leash training him. These products will hold up for him. They will hold up for you. I wished they made a harness. I would buy in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Gorilla

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: My Yellow lab kept chewing the plastic buckle off his brother's collars so I needed one without plastic. This collar looks great and so far has not been chewed. It has the advantage of being reflective at night which makes it much easier to find a black lab in the dark. I cannot evaluate the durability of this collar as I have only had it a couple of weeks but it does appear to be well made and I am hoping for long wear. It should last a long time unless the Yellow develops a taste for the collar itself.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and High Quality Collars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one each for my medium size dogs in the small size, which was perfect. The collars have enough room so they are not tight on the dogs but thick enough so the collars won’t pull off. The collars mainly are bright colors and are easy to clean. I plan to order two more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The color is vibrant and beautiful, and the collar fits my dog perfectly. I really like the separate tag tab because we have accidentally clipped the leash to the tag in the past. When we did that, our dog pulled loose and the tag fell off. With the tag in a different location than the clip ring, we no longer have that problem. Also, since the buckle orients itself to the bottom, her name tag is always very visible. I also appreciate the reflective stripes since our dog is brown, it makes her more visible at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reflective
customer_reviews.text: This collar is really sturdy but dosn't seem to heavy for my lab mix, we like it. I like the second ring for her dog tags When I ordered this I wasn't sure if the two thin lines of reflective stitching would be effective, but it actually works very well, and is highly reflective. I've attached photos - 1 is my dog looking pretty with her collar on, another is a shot with the flash turned on, showing how much reflection there is.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my dog's other collar was a clicked on with adjustable feature. I would adjust it but it will get loose again & again plus her collar would often come off. I also bought a red collar (saw that a red collar was a warning to others not the pet the dog) as my dog has snapped at people with disregard to her temperament. I also love the belt style to adjust to her neck & not come off. Pleasantly surprised there was a little hole for her dog tag...nice touch. Beautifully made & happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Malinois Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but had to return.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to decide on how many stars because I had to return it. It fit my dogs neck in length but it was thick, bulky, and heavy for a small 8lb dog. The buckle and place for her dog tag was very big and bulky. For a larger tough dog, it’s a solid collar, but for a smaller more delicate dog, too much bulk for her throat. Wouldn’t have been able to leave it on her all the time. (I use a harness for leash walking, the collar was for ID tags only)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time and I love it. I didn't know that most people use a flat collar IN ADDITION to other collars, in case they get loose. So this will be the collar to hold her tags. I love that it's reflective for dark morning walks and she doesn't mind it one bit!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar on every level!
customer_reviews.text: This collar is fantastic and (hopefully) completely resolves the problem we’ve been having with losing collars w/electric fence receivers attached, when playing. I was impressed with the durability of the collar as I punched two holes in it, as it took a while to make the receiver fit. That’s a good thing. There is no doubt it is secure and the collar will be difficult to detach while playing. I live the extra buckle hole for tags as well as the reflective stitching. It’s a very attractive collar. I showed my friend when it arrived and told her about your 1 for 1 donation to rescues. She immediately ordered one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I actually just got this collar, and can't really attest to it's durability, however it seems strong and I like that it has reflective lines on it and a special place for her name tag so the leash or rabies tag won't bang against it and wear it out early. The color is very nice also, not faded out looking, and the metal buckle which is hard to find anymore is what we needed. Our dog keeps breaking the plastic clip ones.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Well made to last
customer_reviews.text: Just a few weeks ago I bought a collar for my Tibetan Terrier “Gus”. It had a plastic lock-snap and within a week, the snap broke and it was in the trash.. So I decided to go with the old school metal buckle type. I’m really impressed with this collar! Besides a heavy duty buckle, the strap itself is heavy duty. It’s the quality we used to get with our halters and headstalls! Another thing I like about this collar is that the thread used on it glows! Gus doesn’t get loose, but if he did and at night, cars would easily see him. I recommend this collar to anyone looking for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Coy

customer_reviews.title: Re-inforced holes and specific tag hole on buckle
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of these collars. I ordered two, one for our Husky and one for our Mountain Cur. I prefer a 1 inch double collar for my dogs and these are the best quality I have found. The holes for the buckle are reinforced and they also have a separate spot for hooking their name tags on the collar. They are stylish and the double nylon adds the extra padding I prefer. Added bonus is that they donate to shelters for each purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COLLAR!
customer_reviews.text: Our chocolate lab tends to use her collar for chew toys, so when I ordered the collar from Max & Neo I was glad to find one that had a metal buckle and was reflective. It works wonderfully for a large playful dog and I would highly recommend this product. The price was good and product was just as it was advertised. GREAT COMPANY, especially knowing they help dog rescuers everywhere. ITS A WIN WIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Adams

customer_reviews.title: Max and Neo , great company great collars!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a dog collar with a simple buckle. Max and Neo was where I finally found them. Great product, outstanding price and the fact that for every collar purchased a new one gets sent to a rescue, makes the purchase even better. If I need a collar I will always go to Max and Neo from now on. Just to let you know, when we adopted our newest dog in October, she was wearing a Max And Neo collar!😊. Thank you for giving back to the rescue community!
customer_reviews.author: mom of three

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: After checking the reviews and reading the questions and answers, I got the large collar for my boxer/husky mix. It was a little too big for him. I contacted the seller to see how we can exchange it. Not only did they reply immediately, they even sent out a replacement collar right away with a return label to send the other one back. I was so surprised and really impressed by the service. The collar itself is really well made. The best I've seen and used. If they ever make them for small dogs, I'll get one for my other puppy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this collar twice (I measured wrong) because I originally bought a large, which was too big for my dog. It would slip right over her head on the smallest hole. The medium is almost too small. I usually keep it on the largest hole, sometimes the next one up. She is a 55lb pit bull, but does have a small neck. Anyway, make sure you measure. I do wish there was a size in between the two, but the medium can work. Otherwise this collar is high quality. No plastic buckles that often break over time.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fleischhauer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product and the customer service of the company
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product and the customer service of the company. The collars are very durable and are even withstanding a puppy's chewing habits. Some time before, I bought collars from Petsmart, and they didn't last even a week. I love that these have a lifetime warranty. I had to exchange the large for medium due to my error in measuring, and I was able to contact the company through email, got a prompt response, and they got me the size I needed. It was so easy! I also love that they make donations with each purchase. It just adds to my overall experience with Max and Neo. I will definitely order from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, fantastic customer service. Do not look anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: We have been loyal customers of max and neo for years. I just realized that we have not actually spent the time to review and let others know about their products. Their products are genuinely of very high quality. Our puppy is very energetic and we went through numerous collars. The max and neo one is going strong after 2 years while in the first year we went through 6/7 others. Additionally customer service is absolutely fantastic. they stand behind their product to the fullest. Do not look at any other products and waste your time and money like we did.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking and well made collar. Great for large dogs. Unfortunately, it is too much of a hassle for me to constantly undo the "belt" type of latch. I will be going back to a traditional clip type of closure.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Cute Collar for Choco Lab Pup
customer_reviews.text: We got Blue in Small. Our male Chocolate Lab puppy is 10 weeks old and growing. This collar fits great for him. I like the gunmetal hardware and the grey reflective stitching. Awesome price. Great Buy. Looks Cute!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: breaks in very nicely. In my opinion
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality collar and well worth the cost. Many of the nylon collars out there are a much thinner material and nowhere near the quality. The buckle is heavy duty and the collar, although being thick, breaks in very nicely. In my opinion, the best part of all is that for every collar they sell Max and Neo donates an identical collar to a dog rescue. The last 2 dogs we have had came from a rescue and it is well worth the extra money spent on the collars knowing that a portion of it is going to dogs in need.
customer_reviews.author: Greg K

customer_reviews.title: very nice product. I ordered the medium and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello, very nice product. I ordered the medium and it was actually too big for my 38 pound little guy so I donated it to the rescue where I got him and reordered the small size. I just got the small and it's too small, the rescue gets this one too. I really like the collars, but the sizes are a little unforgiving, there's a big difference between small and medium. I'll have to go with a different brand. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars. I’ve bought two, as well as two matching leashes, and these are the only collars I’ll buy from now on. They are super sturdy and are easy to clean, although I feel like they stay clean for a really long time. The leases are matching, and are sturdy as well. The two handles allow for easy length adjustment. I love these products.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa j

customer_reviews.title: Awesome durable collar!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these, one for my dog & 1 for daughter's dog. These collars are great! They are durable enough to get a good grip on as sometimes is necessary with a "puppy in training". I appreciate the old fashioned buckle & holes that prevents fabric slipping when dog is pulling hard. Plus they are very easy to keep clean. I liked the collar so much I ordered a second as back up for when the first one needs a little extra cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Great product, Vibrant colors !
customer_reviews.text: Bought the size small in pink and blue for my two 7 month old Boston Terriers. The size fits great and they have room to grow. Colors are vibrant, buckle shiny and strong. Really appreciate the great value as I was eyeing something similar in a local pet shop for twice the price. Value and Quality combined with the fact that this company gives back and helps homeless pups makes this an an awesome purchase all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M.

customer_reviews.title: Great collar, and very reflective.
customer_reviews.text: USAGE: I got the Large 1" width, and have a 62lb boxer mix with a 16" neck. PROS: Good durable design, with sturdy reflective stitching. The hardware is a nice muted black chrome look. There are good grommets at each buckle position so you don't have to worry about the material separating. CONS: None that I could find. It's a collar, and it works. SUMMARY: Would recommend to anyone with a medium sized dog who likes early morning and late night walks.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.J

customer_reviews.title: Without an ID it's just a necklace
customer_reviews.text: i'm saddened to write this review. we purchased this collar for our 40 lb aussie rescue in Sept 2018. the collar itself is marvelous. thick, durable and well-made. but if you have an ID on your dogs collar because it's a runner like ours...disappointment is coming your way. The separate loop for the ID tag came off completely. we didn't even make it a year. this feature was a big deal for me because it kept my kids from hooking the leash to the wrong loop. now we are back to what we have to do with all the other collars. of course the return window is closed. I had hoped for much much better.
customer_reviews.author: anipod

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Our latest rescue is a big beautiful pittie girl. We love that they donate a collar to a rescue, since we work in rescue this was a BIG PLUS in our book. We needed a good sturdy collar and this one is great! It was one of the only brands we could find the had a belt-like closure and not a cheap plastic buckle. I will definitely purchase from Max and Neo again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except the medium was too short and the large was too long. I had a shoe repair shop add two eyelets and I cut the excess length off and melted the edge to keep it from fraying.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Spaghetti

customer_reviews.title: This is the collar you need
customer_reviews.text: This is the collar you need. Having a collar that is easy to take on and off is important, especially in spring during tick season. The other collar I had was not to easy to take on and off you basically had to adjust it by sliding the buckle back and forth on the collar itself, which made checking for ticks difficult. This a well made collar, very sturdy, and the reflective stitching is great to keep tabs on her when she wakes me up at 3 a.m. to do her business in the 8 acre field next to our house.
customer_reviews.author: Handy J

customer_reviews.title: Plan on buying more!
customer_reviews.text: Great collar for the price especially for my large puppy who enjoys taking her siblings collars off. I ultimately purchased this product because I saw a similar or maybe the same one in a pet store and loved the way it looked and because we needed something heavy duty for our chewy dogs. I love the fact that the collar comes with a warranty as well as a donation of a collar which I hope isn't just a scam. I will probably end up buying another one or two of these collars because they keep their color even when my dogs roll in the mud and they're very bright and vibrate however, I wish they had more color options.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn WarrenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my dog a medium and had to return and get a small, I measured wrong! It's cute and I really like a buckle closure as opposed to a snap, I think it is sturdier. I like it has a hole for his charm! I like the cause as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for now - but!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this product 5 stars when received. Seems to be high quality and well made. But, I will withold final review for a couple months. I have a 3 year old goldendoodle and I am not sure what he does with his collar (which he wears 24/7), but after a few months, the metal circles around the adjustment holes are gone, webbed collars start fraying and within a short period of time are so frayed, I am afraid they will break and he will be left with no identification (even though he is micro-chipped. So, I will give it a couple of months - then offer a final review!
customer_reviews.author: Mj Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Minor design change from the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I picked this collar for the metal buckle, reinforced holes, and the separate tag clip. I was a little disappointed when it arrived and the tag clip was now part of the buckle not attached to a separate spot like the pics show. Other than that it appears well made and will be putting it on my dog when he decides to get up from his afternoon nap, he lives the spoiled life.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the collar. Finally a collar with an actual buckle that’s also small enough to fit my 10 pound dog. He is on the second to last buckle hole so it can be used for an even smaller dog, and yet there are enough holes for a pretty big range of sizes. I have arthritis in my fingers and can’t use the buckles that you have to squeeze together to open and shut. Finally a company that thought of older and/or handicapped people. Hard to find and excellent collar and company. Max and Neo, I will be back for the matching leash.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really adore the charitable side of this company. The collars are well designed and well made and the reflective quality is a great addition. I also noticed that there is a small hole in the buckle in which to connect my dog's tags an inventive feature keeping us from having to use the same loop for tags and leash attaching.
customer_reviews.author: Facelikeaflint

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Collars
customer_reviews.text: These collars are extremely well made, they are very bright at night and they come with a dog tag clip ready for tags. I have bought three of these for my two labs and cocker spaniel. The 1.5 in wide is fantastic for my Labs while the 1 in wide collar is perfect for my smaller dog. They are well worth the extra bucks vs the other brands, these are heavy duty type collars not thin and flimsy like most other collars. Great product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto L Torna

customer_reviews.title: Please Add BARCS to you Rescue agencies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, sturdy collar... although I didn't get to use it. I purchased it initially for a dog we adopted from BARCS animal rescue in Baltimore, MD. However, he is very large and the collar was just a bit too small. I would just like to suggest that you make one more larger size, for giant pooches. Thus I donated it to BARCS. Great collar, vibrant & as I stated - sturdy, thick and good buckle.
customer_reviews.author: SheriR

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well made - the larger collar has a double buckle and is nice and wide. Made with a reflective (two) thread running around the collar. Nice place to attach a tag on the buckle itself so less rattling and hangs closer to the neck so less apt to snag. Had it about two weeks and got a compliment on it just yesterday. And they donate to rescues - win/win on this one!
customer_reviews.author: RobbyR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium side for my beagle mix and it fixes perfectly on him. I love the quality of the collar as well as the fact that it has the reflective stitching on it too. I also defiantly love the fact the a collar was donated to a needy puppy when I ordered my collar. I will most defiantly recommend this sell to others.
customer_reviews.author: ScooterDude 82

customer_reviews.title: Great reflective collar!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second collar since I initially bought the medium for my dog and it was too loose for him. I love the thickness of the medium size but it was too big for him, so now I got him the small and it fit perfectly. So it does run a bit big, but I love how strong it is and the reflective material. I also like that it is buckle type because my dog tends to manage to snap off the quick release collars and loose them.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a lab-mix puppy. At 6 mo and growing I ordered this collar XL, which turned out to be a bit too large right now, but expect he will soon grow into it. My only complaint, minor, is the description did not say that the width of this collar was 1 1/2" instead of 1". I have an ID tag that slips onto a collar of up to 1". This not a problem, I also have normaL "hanging" tags. A very sturdy and attractive collar, reflects quite well!!
customer_reviews.author: Rock Betu

customer_reviews.title: Great collar new design
customer_reviews.text: I love the have that this collar has metal buckles and eyelets instead of a plastic clip. I had the first one of these collars for years until someone hooked the leash to the tag ring. That can't happen with this new version as the tags now hook on to the collar through a small hole in the buckle. I expect this collar to last for many years like the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr FS

customer_reviews.title: I don't know who's more excited: me or the Welsh
customer_reviews.text: Just received this collar and it's just fantastic. Well made and looks sharp. I have a Welsh Terrier and purchased the small. Perfect fit and I just love the fact that the end sits perfectly and doesn't hang off. With his old one, I had to add a piece of velcro to keep the end in place. Also, there's a separate tab that holds his tags. Nice! Needless to say, the buy one give one aspect of this purchase was an added bonus. The Welsh? He was just excited to get something new.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyAZ

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the metal buckles to the plastic snap buckles ...
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the metal buckles to the plastic snap buckles, especially on my pets, they just make it feel safer. That is why i chose the Max and Neo MAX reflective metal buckle dog collars over the others. They are very brightly colored which stands out in the daytime really well. But they REALLY stand out at night when light hits them. The reflective threads that they are sewn with actually surprised me just how much they do reflect and how far away they can be seen!!
customer_reviews.author: hill1000

customer_reviews.title: Safest Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many dog collars over the years and find these to be about the best. I have found collars with plastic fasteners tend to slip especially as they wear over time, and if you have two labradors as we do, they can tighten when the dogs are roughhousing. The Max and Neo collars have metal buckles with metal reinforced holes in the collar for the tang to fit into, so there is no chance of them inadvertently tightening. Overall quality is very good too. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Coto Pete

customer_reviews.title: Nice double thick collar
customer_reviews.text: Nice double thick collar, and I like the tag holder. The buckle is a little odd, it moves a little different. When putting on the dog, it is very hard to feed the end of the collar under the buckle to push it through. Took a few tries, but I did get it to go under the buckle part. Had to order a different slide tag, and hopefully it will fit. I prefer the slide tags on the collar, since the dogs have so many other tags they are required to wear.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding gear for our dogs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 rescues that play hard. A big Amstaff and little pug/shepherd mix that thinks he is big. The collars are excellent quality. Sturdy and tough. A different style for the large came instead of the one I ordered and we love it even better. The quality for price is outstanding. We love even more that every piece we buy gives other dogs in need what they need. Thank y'all for that and the great products
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: Max & Neo collar
customer_reviews.text: Our GSD could get her head out of her previous collar. We were so pleased with your leash, that we bought a matching collar. Since this one buckle, it doesn't get larger & she's not able to get her head through it as easily. I also like the idea that you donate an identical product to a rescue.
customer_reviews.author: female jeep

customer_reviews.title: Help shelter animals!!
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered from Max and Neo for years. I have always been very happy with all of their products. This collar and matching leash are very well made, sturdy and a bright beautiful blue! One of the best things about this company is, that for every item purchased, they donate a matching item to shelters across the country!! So, don’t hesitate to buy, you won’t be sorry 🐶
customer_reviews.author: colleen l.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered collars for my two Laboradors and I love them. The buckles are strong and I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered collars for my two Laboradors and I love them. The buckles are strong and I was impressed with the reflective stitching. I take my dogs out in the backyard with a flashlight for the last time on training collars. They get to do their business, I don't get dragged around by two large dogs, and I can see them very easily. I also like the idea that they are supplying rescues with extra collars. I like these collars so much that I just ordered another one for my son's dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Only Collar for the Well-dressed Hound
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from Max and Neo several times. This is the second time I have ordered collars--my younger basset outgrew his first! The quality is superb and the colors stay bright. In fact the collar has now found a second home because, even after months and months of heavy usage, it still looks and operates great! These collars would be worth the money spent even if collars were not provided to shelters but, I LOVE doing business with a company who seems to put caring over profits.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Kodish

customer_reviews.title: My dog breaks collars in a week, this one held up for months
customer_reviews.text: My girl always breaks her collar, and it's really hard to find one that won't snap after a week. She's pretty strong and active, so I needed a collar that would hold up to her yanking. This collar has lasted for months now, and I have no doubt that it'll continue to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: What's better than helping another dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought the red collar for my white & black brindle pitbull and it looks absolutely beautiful on her. The red is very rich & vibrant and the collar seems to be very durable. I would definitely recommend this collar and will purchase more in the future. I think it's great that another dog gets a collar when you purchase one for your own dog!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great well made collars!
customer_reviews.text: Our fur babies, Lilly and Sidney love their new collars! They are so well made and attractive! We love the tab for the name tags! We got stainless steel bones that look great! I also like the old fashion look rather than lots of plastic buckles! I am a great animal lover so I certainly do like the work you two are doing for dogs and I think cats also! I applaud you both!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Beshore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I love the vibrant color of this collar. It contrasts with my Husky's fur beautifully. I also appreciate how sturdy it is. It has to stand up to her big brother's hassling! The attention to detail is also good. The reflective stitching and the hole in the buckle for the tag add to the overall quality. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H. Byers

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great, except for the brushed metal.
customer_reviews.text: These work well, and are reflective as advertised. The dogs don't seen to hate them, and they wash easily. Only problem is that the brushed brass, or whatever the metal is, is fading to be a ugly brown color. Overall the colar material is good quality, and would buy again. If you're more interested in the appearance of colars, I'd go a different route, but for actual quality, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable for a 90 LB PULLING MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: Our 90 LB black lab needed a buckle collar instead of a clip, as she kept busting out of her clip collars. We have had her Max & Neo collar for over a year and have absolutely no issues with it! It is made of great quality and stands up to her high energy. She is also a hunting dog and wears this collar out in the fields. I highly recommend this brand and these collars. She is 90 LBs and wears a size Large.
customer_reviews.author: Julia H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Wonderful company.
customer_reviews.text: I love the new reflective collar for my husky. It is sturdy with a metal buckle. The built in ring for tags was easy to attach his tags. I definitely recommend this collar and I am happy to do business with a company that gives back to animal rescues. All of our dogs have been adopted from rescue groups.
customer_reviews.author: amywolves

customer_reviews.title: Max and Neo Fan 4 Life!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very high quality collar! It's beautiful and very visible at night! I love that I get more for my money because a collar is donated with every purchase. Great job, Max and Neo!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: MAX reflective collar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my big Kitty but it was too big & bulky for him. So I gave it to my sister for her little chacha doggy. Saw him in it the other day & he looked so handsome in it! Very nice & well made collar! And I like that they donate to another in need with my purchase of it too. That is why I didn't send it back when it didn't fit my kitty.
customer_reviews.author: suzan sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Superior
customer_reviews.text: This collar is very well made. I believe it will last many, many years. The metal parts are thick and high quality. I have no worries that the collar or metal will break. The orange color I bought is a great shade, too. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kay Peoples

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS COLLAR!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar! It is of great quality, and is a perfect fit! The color (blue) is a great, vibrant shade. I love that it has reflective stitching and even a notch specifically for a tag. It’s a well thought out product and my handsome boy is rocking his new collar! LOL I will be ordering another one soon to have as a spare, in case he decides to roll around in “stuff” again! 🤦🏻‍♀️ The fact that another fur baby benefits from my purchase is just icing on the cake!!! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy P

customer_reviews.title: Good looking quality color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this collar for 3 almost 4 months now with NO complaints. The small eyelets have not come out of the collar, the collar has not given out when my dog gets excited and pulls, and he is a 45 lb bull terrier. The small loop in the buckle for the dog tag is perfect, over time the medal does discolor but that’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Martian Man

customer_reviews.title: Love the collar
customer_reviews.text: Love the collar. Durable, looks great. It is true that reflective stitching isn't all THAT visible from a distance, but I wasn't expecting that to be the case, so I wasn't particularly disappointed. If I could change one thing, I would have made a medium length collar that also comes in a 3/4" width. But as I said, the collar is functional, durable, and more than one person has commented on how good it looks. So I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for strong dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar. It's very easy to put on and really easy to take off. It has a nice space for the dog tags. Great for my pitbull. Strong material. My dog weighs 75 pounds and it's great. Wonderful item for a dog walking day. Lol 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and good quality, and it also helps a good cause! I will be getting more Max and Neo items going forward! After having/using for a couple months I am taking a star away due to the D ring being a little far from the buckle...so the end of the collar is always slipping out, its annoying at worst but annoying none the less.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: it looks fantastic. I love that there is reflective stitching
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this for a few hours. But seriously, it looks fantastic. I love that there is reflective stitching. There's a tab for his tags. This red collar looks awesome on my German Shepherd. When the other one needs a new collar, hers will be the pink one.
customer_reviews.author: Luvnmymedic

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars. They are very durable and look great on my pup. I also love the idea of the small hole in the buckle for his name tag, no noise from it now. I highly recommend this product and the idea that a rescue is also getting a collar. Great job Max And Neo :)
customer_reviews.author: spiker702

customer_reviews.title: Strong little collar
customer_reviews.text: This collar is great! This is the first one I found for smaller dogs that is actually wide and has heavy duty fasteners. My dog might be small, but he's tough and I could never trust the adjustable slide collars, or the smaller hasp ones Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joe_N_PA

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent! Unfortunately small is too small and medium has extra length that can't be handled close to the collar so that it sticks out,but that's just MY dog. I'd recommend the quality of this product whole heartedly.
customer_reviews.author: butterfinggers

customer_reviews.title: Quality Collar
customer_reviews.text: Great collar good quality material and I love that I can see my Abbie at night when I take them out before bedtime. The reflective collar works great! My problem is the medium size was too small so I gave that collar to my son for his dog and the large is a little too big would be great if they had something to hold down the excessive piece of collar as I had to go to the second to last hole to make it work. I love that this company donates when you buy to dog rescues I will buy from them again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This collar is great. I have a pittie and she has super sensitive skin so I had to change her collar type. This is the first collar we've had that hasn't rubbed her raw. I like the separate hook to attach her tags to and the stitching does reflect light. A great collar and a great cause. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kickboxing mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy collar that was easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy collar that was easy to put on. Fits perfectly while still able to stick two fingers under the collar. My dog doesn't seem to notice that she's wearing it at all. She used to scratch at her old collar but hasn't bothered this one at all. I also appreciate that they donate a collar to rescue dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy collar
customer_reviews.text: I really like this collar - it's not as reflective as I expected, but I need something VERY reflective as I have an all-black large dog and I walk him at night. Still, it's very solid and well made, the color is bright, and the D-ring is solid. I feel comfortable that my dog is comfy in it and he's safe. It was hard to get the collar to buckle when I first put it on, but that speaks to how sturdy it is. I'd prefer a collar with a clip, but this looks really nice and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Carter

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made. However, I ordered a size that is larger and heavier for her neck. But no worries. I plan to donate it to one of our shelters/rescue groups. Ellensburg Animal Shelter or Kittitas County Friends of Animals. I will be ordering a smaller, more comfortable collar from you for my sweet dog. Thank you for all you do for the animals!
customer_reviews.author: grandmasplace

customer_reviews.title: Best dog collar
customer_reviews.text: The color is rich and vibrant. My dog loves i! I love it! And you help rescue dogs when you purchase. It’s a win win all around!
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Fatchett

customer_reviews.title: Love that they donate to shelters
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the seller also provides one to a shelter. The medium ended up being a little too snug for my dog, but it allowed me the opportunity to donate to my local shelter. I will be purchasing a larger collar another day soon. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Collar
customer_reviews.text: The fit was a little hard to figure out. My first thought was go big however that didn't work because the collar could slip off easily. Once I ordered the medium size I was set. They are nice looking collars and they seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: scomcdon

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reflective Collars!
customer_reviews.text: Both Libby and Maggie wear Max and Neo MAX reflective collars. They are extremely well made and highly reflective. The metal buckle is very sturdy. And, the little tab on the side for securing tags is an added bonus. Libby has outgrown the orange collar so I just bought her the blue one. Highly recommend. A++.
customer_reviews.author: S. Zollner

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this collar. It is very well constructed and sturdy. The color is vibrant and shows up nicely on my dogs dark fur. I like that the buckle has smooth edges JuJu is a rescue and the best benefit of this collar is another rescue dog gets donated a great collar too!! We will be back for more in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Great for large dogs.
customer_reviews.text: VERY impressed! Heavy duty, excellent quality... a lot of bang for the buck. I bought this one for my 4 month German Shepherd, she has a 15” neck and the medium fits her perfect on the tightest notch. I like this so much I just ordered another one for my 110 lb Shepherd/Husky mix (she regularly slips collars and has broken clasp collars; I would also suggest to use the metal ring for tags, as the tag holder is made of plastic.) Great collar.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Very well-made heavy duty, heavy duty buckles, highly reflective stitching.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, very reflective, heavy duty buckle and perfect fit. I've looked at pet stores, Walmart, Farm supply and they are all chintzy and thin, and I hardly ever see one with reflective stitching. This one is very well made, heavy duty and priced reasonable for what you get. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nightwillow2

customer_reviews.title: Best dog collar ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best collar ever and I love that they donate one for every one you purchase. The quality was so good when we bought one for our new pup, a rescue, that we bought a second one for our year old rescue pup. Where you put the tags on these collars is brilliant and the reflective stitching is perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Albright

customer_reviews.title: Will buy another
customer_reviews.text: I bought the extra large for my English mastiff. He is on the last set of holes. It is super reflective I can see him at night from across the property. Deffenetly the reason i bought it. Only downside is the bright orange color faded fast. Still orange but seemed orange-er out if the box. Will buy another one for my other mastiff.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: My favorite collar period
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great collar. I bought a second to alternate colors. It handle multiple daily walk, multiple swimming outing a month. The collar stands up great with virtually no wear, no rusting. The reflective stitching is great in the dark. I also think that it’s great they donate to shelters. It’s a win for everyone. I have had may dogs and this is by far and away the best collar.
customer_reviews.author: laserdarb76

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: Collar looks good, is sturdy enough for my Lab who plays all over my farm. No cheap, plastparts. Has a nice metal buckle instead. It's reflective, but not as highly as I'd hoped. Still, it's a really nice coller.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Hesper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and flexible
customer_reviews.text: We have used this collar for over two months and it is just great. While it was a little stiff buckling up the first couple days, the collar loosened up well and is easy to put on and take off. The hardware is very sturdy and the stitching is well done. We would purchase this collar again and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: theeleven

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these collars for my dogs. One of my friends is a Labrador Retriever and the other is a miniature Doberman. They are very durable and gorgeous. The buckles and rings are reflective.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Proof
customer_reviews.text: These collars are great. I was looking for a metal clasp collar after our (large) puppies chewed numerous other plastic-clasp collars off of each other. This looks good and has been indestructible so far.
customer_reviews.author: Louis E

customer_reviews.title: love these.  love the donation to help other pets
customer_reviews.text: We've bought a couple of these for our dogs. Great colars and very sturdy. No complaints at all. I cut off the extra tag tab so that I could slide an on-the-collar name tag from boomerangtags.com close to the buckle.
customer_reviews.author: John Danilson

customer_reviews.title: Reflective stitching works great
customer_reviews.text: The reflective stitching is perfect. It catches whatever small amounts of light there may be around and lets me easily locate my dog in my backyard at night. The buckle seems well made and sturdy with a nice gunmetal looking finish. I bought the medium for my 1 year old male Shiba Inu. He's on the last hole, but I think the small would end up being a bit too small when his neck fur returns to maximum floof mode. An extra smedium or something would have been a nice inbetween size.
customer_reviews.author: DS

product_meta.title: Max and Neo MAX Reflective Metal Buckle Dog Collar - We Donate a Collar to a Dog Rescue for Every Collar Sold
feature_bullets: YOUR PURCHASE HELPS A DOG RESCUE: For every collar sold, we donate an identical collar to a dog rescue. Dog rescues are in constant need of dog supplies. We donate 1 for 1 for every collar purchase. By purchasing one of our dog collars, you receive a premium high quality collar and you donate one to a rescue. Together we can support dog rescues with a never ending supply of collars.

DOG RESCUES: Each month we donate to different rescues throughout the USA. At the end of every month, we tally up the number of leashes and collars sold. Based on the number, we determine how many rescues we can donate to for that month. We donate down our list of rescues until each one has received a donation and then we go back to the top of our list. In special cases, we will donate to rescues out of turn based on their immediate needs.

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Our metal buckle dog collar is 1" wide (3/4" small size) and made with a double nylon layer making it 4mm thick (medium and large sizes). We use a heavy duty buckle and put metal eyelets in each hole to reinforce the collar. All the metal has been anodized into a beautiful gunmetal finish. The collar has reflective stitching all around to make it more visible at night. We've also added an extra tab for easy attachment of dog tags and charms.
SIZING for MAX Collar: X-Small - 8.5"-11.5", Small - 11"-15", Medium - Neck Size 15"-19", Large - Neck Size 19"-23" , X-Large 22"-26"
